topProducts.name: Vegan Donuts
topProducts.description: A large selection of unique donut flavors are available as vegan options. Some reviews note they can be dry, but others praise them as top-tier.
quotes: My first time coming I was refered by a friend since going vegan and had a taste for a donut; I got two of each of 4 vegan donuts selections (Vanilla Starlet, orange, ginger & cinnamon infused glaze, Sugar Kane (vanilla glaze), and a vegan strawberry), so 8 donuts total
Top tier vegan donuts that taste just like normal ones and the service is great

topProducts.name: Vanilla Starlet
topProducts.description: A specific vegan donut flavor mentioned by a customer.

topProducts.name: Coffee
quotes: The donuts and coffee selections were numerous and tasty
Friend had the drip coffee, would NOT recommend

topProducts.name: Chai Latte
topProducts.description: A customer mentioned a 'perfect' Chai latte. Vegan status would depend on the milk used.
quotes: Chai latte was perfect and I got a free doughnut :) thanks

highlightedReviews.author: Chris Montan
highlightedReviews.text: Love the outside of the store with its pretty pink facade. We found this place after visiting Children's Minneapolis for a dr visit. We were welcomed so warmly as soon as we walked in and enjoyed the vast array of unique donut flavors offered including vegan options. You can tell that the bakery and staff are very supportive of the city which is something that always makes me happy. We hemmed and hawed over a couple flavors because there were so many good options that it was tough to decide. The lovely lady that was helping us made sure that was not a problem and gave us two free donuts on top of the half dozen we ended up paying for. We loved all of the options we brought home but especially the bananaramma, the caramel apple cheesecake and the chocolate w/ salted caramel. We'll be back again in the future without a question.

highlightedReviews.author: Mitchell Mudd
highlightedReviews.text: Incredible vegan selection!! Grabbed all 7 vegan options and we really liked all of them. Only thing we found odd was how dense they were for yeast donuts. It wasn't bad, but we had some airier ones in Portland, and I think that would be nice to have here as well. The inside was cute and it wasn't busy when we were there. The people working there were nice.

highlightedReviews.author: Shay Hale
highlightedReviews.text:
The atmosphere of this place is certainly worth the visit alone. It's a great experience from start to finish and I couldn't seem to look away from the 50s interior paired with the vintage items, but I was captivated by the paintings.
The donuts had a ton of options, with a bunch of really fun flavors. I had to go with a classic to kinda get a good feel for the place before I got a fancy flavor. So strawberry it was! Which the donut itself was awesome, loved the croissant texture to it.
The one thing I would say about this place is the donuts are really rich. The toppings remind me more of frosting than of glaze. I hope to be back, but next time I'll certainly be grabbing a coffee to even put the sweet.

Other than that the staff seemed friendly, and there were lots of vegan options. So I would recommend this place.

highlightedReviews.author: Don Dude
highlightedReviews.text:
Iconic artisan donut shop and  arguably the one kinda re-invented and drive donuts back into 'mainstream'.
These are not your grandma's donuts, unless your Grandma was the Salvadore Dahli of the Donut world!  üòâ
Very high quality ingredients and wonderfully cooked and perfect textures!  many decadent signatures like salted caramel chocolate.  A huge range of flavor profiles and good range of Vegan options.
Fun ecclectic artsy shop to match the creativeness of the product!
Great coffee and other beverages as well.
Love it!  If you are in town, absolutely take a little time to check it out!

highlightedReviews.author: KayDee Bakken
highlightedReviews.text: The selection of donut flavors, vegan and regular are phenomenal. We walked in and all three people behind the counter greeted us with smiles and ‚Äúgood mornings.‚Äù They were very patient with us, answered all our questions and orders. Their dirty chai is to die for, along with the strawberry donut. Will be back, much loveü´∂üèª

highlightedReviews.author: Anna Wilson
highlightedReviews.text: Vegans like donuts too!! ü´∂üèæ Thank you for including us! I‚Äôve been a patron of this place for years and the donuts are always delicious and the service is always super friendly. They are particularly aware and helpful of any type of food preference or allergy, offering things like separate boxes for non-dairy or nuts etc. While I usually get mine to go, the funky, bright atmosphere inside always makes you want to stay and hang out. Thank you for being inclusive in all the ways üç©üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåà

highlightedReviews.author: Kristen Costello
highlightedReviews.text:
The donuts and coffee selections were numerous and tasty! Shout out to the seasonal Snickerdoodle Latte. That pumpkin donut makes me feel sorry for every other donut. They have vegan versions, which is dope for folks with unique dietary needs.

The service and atmosphere were outstanding. The folks working are happy, kind, and funny. Making conversation and singing along while we made our tough choices. You felt welcomed instantly and left in a lighter spirit (though maybe not a lighter weight üòÖ).

highlightedReviews.author: Ryan Sweet
highlightedReviews.text:
Everyone else is right. The donuts and building are great. Retro and kitschy but most of all fun. If you‚Äôre reading this review trying to decide if you should go. Do it. Highly endorse. I had the OG and the vegan donuts. Both great. Vegan donut was a little more dense, but ultimately just as good as the others.

If you‚Äôre the owner/manager/staff reading this. Great job. Thank you! The staff the morning of Mar 22 ‚Äò25 could not have been better. Helpful, funny, thoughtful and cool! Any business would be lucky to have them.

highlightedReviews.author: Dominique Martinez
highlightedReviews.text: Amazing donut shop with a large selection of vegan options. The staff is SO COOL and easy to hang with.

highlightedReviews.author: CRBondi
highlightedReviews.text: Absolutely excellent client service. The donuts were BEYOND EXCELLENT. I ordered 9 dozen online on a Friday at 2pm needing them at 8am the next morning. I was hopeful but didn‚Äôt think this was reasonable for me to expect. The online ordering they have was super easy, the online payment was a breeze.  I placed the order and then was able to locate their contact info very easily on their page and sent a quick email requesting confirmation they could do this order. Within minutes I received a reply that it would be ready. GlamDoll Donuts came through after I wasted 2 hrs and 40 minutes trying to get assistance with Krispy Kreme. Obviously GlamDoll is committed to superior client service and the ‚Äúdonut bar‚Äù was the hit of the whole event and it exposed 150 new people to GlamDoll and your excellent client service. Thank you for saving this event.
